verses.name: Genesis 30:35
verses.text: And he removed that day the he goats that were ringstraked and spotted, and all the she goats that were speckled and spotted, and every one that had some white in it, and all the brown among the sheep, and gave them into the hand of his sons.

verses.name: Genesis 30:36
verses.text: And he set three days’ journey betwixt himself and Jacob: and Jacob fed the rest of Laban’s flocks.

verses.name: Genesis 30:37
verses.text: And Jacob took him rods of green poplar, and of the hazel and chesnut tree; and pilled white strakes in them, and made the white appear which was in the rods.
